content.detailedDescription:
at about 1:45 pm est the power flickered in my clarklake, mi (jackson county) home.   after a moment of thinking what possibly could've made my power momentary interruption, i instinctfully, without prior thought, grabbed my camera and went outdoors to photograph the daturas in my garden.   i am a semi-professional designer and amateur photographer and have been recently posting photos in a flickr.Com account.    as i began to set up my slr-type sony cybershot dsc-h5, i saw a flash in the nw skies, toward jackson, mi (it is now about five minutes after the power flicker).   i set the camera to auto and 'burst' two series of five photographs.   immediately i viewed them through the camera's 3-inch lighted view screen and saw one image with a definite black dot infront of a small cloud.   at that point i went indoors and downloaded the images onto my computer and found that there were at least two objects, one definitely metallic and disc-shaped, flitting about the skies.


i seem to have been missing about an hour's time while outdoors between the power interruption and photos.
 
i thought that the photos were taken around 2pm.   i recall that when the power was interrupted, i looked at the battery-operated clock on the bathroom wall it was about 1:45pm or so.   i went outdoor right afterward and began to photograph my garden's flowers.   i dodn't feel that i was out more than ten or fifteen minutes.   when i looked at the computer clock and saw that it was well past three.   i became very confused and slightly agitated.  i looked at the digital photos and they were all stamped with times after 3pm.    
 
there is no way that i was outdoors for an hour or so... the 'segueway' was seamless...I do not recall the 'jump cut'...Like when a movie is edited back together after snapping.    you're in one place or whatever and suddenly you're somewhere else or doing something or you're just standing or sitting and completely confused.     i don't recall any of that happening.
 
maybe the flashes of light i saw in the sky were some sort of indication of the 'experience' being underway or ending???
 
wow...
content.summary: Power interruption, flashing in the sky, missing time, ufo photos

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling north on ganzel road, i noticed what i thought was a large aircraft,  as i drove closer, i noticed the object was moving entirely too slowly, and there was no noise even though it was relatively close to the ground.  as i got closer to home, i noticed it had flown over my general neighborhood area, and was traveling west toward williamsfield airport.  it appeared as if it came from the superstition mountain area.
normally i would have been more sceptical, but this was no known aircraft.
the object appeared to be black, but it was night time so it could have been any dark color.  the white lights could be described as almost searchlights of high power.  there was also a flashing red light in the center of the bottom of the object.  also of note, but possibly just coincidence was a unusually visible falling star(meteorite) appearing before i saw the object.  this is my testimony of what i saw.
content.summary: Three bright lights equidistant triangle pattern, very slow moving, silent

content.detailedDescription: Hi, my birthday was the next day on the 23d of feburary and i really wated to see a ufo. well it was about 1 in the morning when i was sitting at my computer playin a video game(dota). as the game was over i had to take a piss, i have these 2 doors right next to my computer so i opend one of em and stepd out onto the steps to take a piss. well when i came outside i see this thing.. it was to the left of my house about 100 ft in the air,right above the tree in my neighbors yard, it was moving, made almost no noise expect this high pictch sound as it felw by very slowly,(i thought the sound was my a/c running later to realize it wasnt on that night) like 5-10 mph. this obeject was huge like almost a football field metelic like metal and had the biggest 3 windows spaced out perfectally in the middle of the craft with the brightest wite light comming from these 3 square windows. when i saw the craft i was stunned. i thought it was a plane or a helicopter or even a blimp but it was verywindy and was too low to be anything else and made no noise really. while i just stood there in aww it was slowly moving away from me. i stodd there for about 5 minutes and watced it as it moved to the next street than turned left to go twards the woods. the left turn it made was instant like noting i have ever seen before. i saw the same side the whole time. it slowly made it way twoards the woods and i lost it behind the trees. i went inside after that and went to sleep wonderig what i had just saw. i told my friends about it the next day and non of them believed me. it was like nothing i have ever seen before in my life.
content.summary: Huge cigar shape object with 3 very large bright white windows

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving north on wisconsin state highway 26, approaching burnett, a tiny town of probably less than 500 people, on the way from watertown, wis., to waupun, wis.

i was driving home from a visit to my parents in watertown. the trip takes about an hour. i had stayed later than i intended, because the family had rented "pan's labyrinth," directed by guillermo del toro, and i stayed to watch the movie.

as i approached burnett from the south, i saw a white light resembling an asteroid or other falling cosmic debris, but lacking the characteristic tail which accompanies such events, travelling at an estimated altitude of 1,000 feet and decreasing.

this happened during a period when wisconsin skys are constantly lit up with air traffic: the eaa fly-in in oshkosh draws aviators from all over the country, and planes of various makes and models travel north along an air coridor over dodge county to get to oshkosh.

however, this light remained constant, and lacked the slow on-off cycle characteristic of planes, which is why it caught my attention. it also appeared to be falling rapidly to earth.

i have seen meteors and other natural phenomena along the same road. i travelled 26 between watertown and waupun regularly when i lived with my parents and commuted to my job in waupun. i have since relocated to waupun, and so the commute is only occasional.

i kept my eyes on the object as it continued to fall to earth, passing over my car and becoming obscured by trees as i entered burnett. as i drove through downtown burnett, a bright flash, like lighting, lit up the northern horizon. there was no accompanying sound of thunder. there was no sound of impact or explosion. there was no sound of a sonic boom.

the event lasted in entirety perhaps 30 seconds to a minute. the evening was clear, without clouds or thunderstorms. 

still, on that evening, during that time of year, i was worried it was an airplane crash. a crash of any kind in dodge county would be news, and so, upon returning to waupun approximately 12 a.M. monday morning, i immediately went to the office and called local county sheriff's dispatch operaters to see if anyone was working a plane crash.

dispatchers in dodge county, fond du lac county, columbia county and green lake county all said no such crash had occurred. the dispatcher in fond du lac county referred me to the media line. an eaa aireventure-bound t6 trainer plane had made an emergency landing near fond du lac regional airport earlier in the day.

the emergency landing happened at approximately 7:45 p.M., hours before my sighting. i called back to see if anything had occured more recently; nothing had.

i am thus at a loss to explain exactly what i saw in the sky over northern dodge, southern fond du lac counties that night. i mulled it over for several weeks, and only recently discovered mufon (i at first thought it was a construct of the writers of the x-files, of which i'm a fan) until i was reading livescience.Com and saw the organization actually existed.
content.summary: Resembled a crash of some kind

content.detailedDescription:
It was the week before good friday or a week before that. i was tilling my garden, preparing for planting. about 4 o'clock in the afternoon i decided to take a break and layed back in my lawn chair, for it was hot and the sky was clear. my chair was facing east and i looked up about 90 degrees and saw a jet contrail. the jet itself was about the size of a pinhead and shiney. the contrail indicated that it was traveling almost due east. i looked to the right and saw another jet (same discreption as first jet) moving from southeast to northwest. it was just above my treeline. they were both very high and seemed to be at the same altitude (altho i know each direction has an altitude to fly at.). i wondered where in the sky their paths would cross. as i looked in front of the east bound plane i saw a very large round object, about as big as a dime at arms length, and it was barely visable as if it was camoflaged like the bottom of a b-52, and there seemed to be a thin layer of cirus clouds underneath it. this object was also traveling east (no contrail, nothing) infront of the first plane at about the same speed. it was approaching the intersect point of the two planes. i looked back at the east bound plane, then at the northwest bound plane, then at the round object. the object had changed course and was traveling north east. i ran to get my camera but by the time i got back they were gone.
     i first thought that this was an object in orbit and wondered what do we have that big up there? til it changed course. i would like to know what it was and have spent alot of time looking up since, hoping for another glance of the thing.
content.summary: A round object about the size of a dime at arms length and very high altitude maybe being investigated by two jets.

content.detailedDescription: Is that a star? zoom, zoom, ba-boom its a vroom vroom!
content.summary: Photographing clouds in my back yard.

content.detailedDescription: Era como siempre, trataba de atrapar la luna en mi c���mara cuando busc���ndola sin saber me tope con estos dos fen���menos extra���os que no se si el primero es una estrella o es un ufo. el segundo si es una estrella por seguro pero algo raro le sucede despu���s de ver el objeto extra���o y empieza a haber una metamorfosis que me asusto, ya que no siendo la primera vez que veo este extra���o comportamiento en las estrellas me asusta pues es inusual algo as���, ya que parece un black hole en formaci���n.
content.summary: Objeto extrano y transformacion de una estrella.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog close to the given time, and looked up for no particular reason and noticed a red, star or planet like object...But noticed that it was jetting across the sky very fast. if it were a military aircraft, i assume at these speeds it would have made a sonic boom, and it was very high up, as it resembled no more than a dark red dot (like a pimple) in the sky. i've seen another thing before, but not here. this looked like mars was soaring through our atmosphere at mach 3, in a straight line at a consistent speed. i saw it for about six seconds, and then it hit the cloud line, where it was no longer visible. i immediately called my friend, who had seen a more dramatic episode before, and he was happy to hear about it. no photos, video, etc. available. the time area is accurate, i just saw it and decided to report it. it seemed to be going north - west, from "the zone" toward "texas state university campus". that's all!
content.summary: High altitude red star-type moving object across sky very fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting outside having a smoke early in the morning (2:19am) on 8/8/07 and watching the stars as i frequently do.  just above the northern horizon (nne), about 20 degrees above the ground level and about 10 degrees above the mountain top, i saw an apparent meteor travel quickly straight down (or nearly so) and disappear behind the mountain top.  within two seconds it was followed by another traveling at the same speed and along the same path.  this struck me as odd, since the meteors i usually see in the northern sky are much higher than these.  even more odd was that there were two in a row following the same path.  i reasoned that this could be space debris falling to the ground which had broken up on re-entry and was therefore on the same trajectory. i decided to report this after reading a similar account reported the same evening in oregon.  i am still not sure what these were, since they appeared to be meteors and made no erratic movement.  it just seemed odd that they would follow the same path and appeared to be travelling straight down (but could have been moving indirectly downward and toward or away from me at the same time).  they were the same brightness and slightly brighter than the brightest star in the sky.
content.summary: Two apparent meteors shot straight down, 2 seconds apart, on same path

content.detailedDescription: I was pulling in the driveway at home when i got out of the car and looked at the mountian range.  i saw a light just sitting there.  then, looking like a shooting star, it shot almost straight up but north, and was gone from visual eyesight in seconds!  i have seen this exact thing in the same spot now on two different occassions.  our airplane traffic is a good 10-15 miles away from where i saw these.
content.summary: It looked like a shooting star but it started at the top of the moutain and went allmost straight up and was gone in sec

content.detailedDescription: My grandma and i saw this light while driving north down 7th ave.  it was an extremely quick light. i know it was too close to be a shooting star or anything.  it kind of reminded me of star wars, where the spacecraft suddenly goes at the speed of light. it just vanished.
content.summary: About a half a second...A quick light flashed forward

content.detailedDescription:
Hi
this is to inform that i saw a ufo.. 
3rd august 2007
me and my 2 uncles were in the backyard.. one of my uncle was smoking.I 
started talking about how old stars are and how long their lights take 
to reach the earth.I also showed them saturn. it was almost 9 pm.
suddenly something like flock of 4 birds appeaerd.At first i thought it 
was birds but its was glowing dim.I showed my uncles at once. they 
thought it was aeroplane but it was too near.It was so fast that it 
dissepared so quickly.It was like 7 in shape.And we didnt know what it 
was.... it was a mystery..
if u say it was bird it was glowing and if u say aeroplane it was too 
near... it was so fast that u cant imagine.. it came all the way from 
the otherside and dissapered in about 5 seconds.I live in san francisco 
and it all happend here... me , and my uncles were the only one to see 
it'
content.summary: The ufo was 7 in shape with 4 dots which looked like 4 birds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in a lawn chair at about 11:30 pm on tuesday august 8th 2007.
i was sitting with my dad, and i looked to the sky. i noticed an object zig zaging across the sky and blinking rapidly. it was disc shaped with 2 stubby wing looking things coming out of the front end. my heart felt like it stopped, and i felt very exited. my dad got up out of the chair saying 
"oh my god, what is that?". i said "it looks like some kind of alien craft"
i grabed a spiral note book and drew a picture of what it looked like as it flew over. it stopped suddenly, and turned in place . it flew back towards us at about 1000 mph and about 800 ft. it made no sound at all.
we finnaly lost sight of it behind a tree, and it was gone.
content.summary: It flew over at about 1000 mph, stopped, turned, and flew off

content.detailedDescription:
Driving down county 1, near stewartville, mn.  sighting occurred at 10:45pm, on thursday 08/02/07.

saw a bright light coming in my direction from the horizon.  as the light neared, i noticed it didn't look 'normal' so i pulled to the side of the road.

the thing looked like it was heading right at my vehicle, but made a sharp right turn at the last second - almost directly over me.  i rolled my window down to listen to the craft as it passed.  it appeared to be making a roaring sound.    as the craft tipped on it's side to turn, i snapped one picture with my phone.  the triangular shape of the object was only apparent at this angle.  then it leveled-out and drifted into obscurity to my left.  very fast moving.  whole sighting was under a minute.

the craft's elevation, its speed, its light configuration tell me that this was no ordinary airplane.  i wouldn't rush to say that it was of alien origin, but definitely something i can't explain and never have seen before.
content.summary: Unknown craft with strange light configuration makes sharp right turn.

content.detailedDescription:
The day before mothers day my fiance and myself took off from peachtree dekalb airport in our aircraft (2003 cessna 172sp) enroute to mount pleasant regional (charleston,sc area). near the georgia/south carolina border we where in and out of the clouds/smoke from south georgia fires and on the traffic information system (tis) showed an aircraft with no transponder active (primary only) at our 6olock, the range on the gps moving map/multifunction display was 10 miles. the unid aircraft the next second appeared 2/5's of the way over the screen in a direct line for our aircraft (#xxxxx). the next second i recieved a traffic alert on my screen which indicated that a possible collision was about to occur. i turned on all of my aircraft lights and stobes.  
at this time, we where still in the clouds/smoke and i was looking furiously to try and locate the aircraft to no avail. the next second, the aircraft again in a direct line with us, was 5/5's from the bottom up screen. then the next second, the primary return disappeared, then my fiance about a second to a second and half said "look it's back!" which it was back at around 4/5'. our route of travel was direct from kpdk -> klro via gps/autopilot navigation. at my estimation later after thinking about what was that, is that the speed of the aircraft was around 7000kts.  

[pid/tg] relocated urls to the text box at the bottom of the witness info section
content.summary: Radar/traffic information system shows aircraft @ 7000kts

content.detailedDescription: Minneapolis. early spring, 1990. i was deep sleeping like a log when i just bolted upright for no apparent reason as if i had heard a really loud noise but there wasn't one. and for some reason was called to look out the window so i did but there wasn't anything there.  i kept staring, then the bright green cigar shape came out of the east and cruised across the horizon at a steady pace slowly and silently and then disappeared into the trees to the west. i knew it was a ufo immediately. i felt i was called to see it. i had seen one about 10 years earlier near barnum minnesota do short bursts of speed and a zig zag and then bolt out of the sky at a sharp angle. i never felt scared.  i woke my girlfriend up and i think she may have seen the last glow of it through the trees.
content.summary: Lime green cigar traveling east to west low on the horizon

content.detailedDescription: I had been observing the moon's occultation of the pleiades when i decided to take a look at mars which was positioned just a few degrees west of the moon.  i had heard that mars was experiencing a planet-wide dust storm and just wanted to see if its relative brightness had changed very much.  i had just gotten the planet focused when a gun-metal grey cylinderical object passed from west to east directly below the image of mars.  probably 1/2" below the planet in relative terms.  it took the object about 3 seconds to cross my field of view and unfortunately i couldn't track it any further.  the object had no lights so i'm certain it wasn't an aircraft.  of course, it could have been a satellite but i don't know if they orbit in the part of the sky i was looking at.  this took place around 4:00am.
content.summary: Cylinder sighted

content.detailedDescription:
I live in the mojave desert about 20 miles east of palmdale,ca. 

on a june 2007 evening i walked outside to take some trash out and something caught my eye. an object that looked like a black armchair was moving past my home about 1000 feet above vertically and about 2500 feet away horizontally. it moved about 200 kts silently past my home and across the small town heading directly east. after crossing the town it appeared to accelerate and veer to the southwest. it was a deep black color and was easy to follow visually for quite a long distance.

i was dumbfounded and didn't do anything but stand there with mouth agape while it went past me. it looked like the black armchair in the old maxell commercials. basically a black cube with a bit removed from the upper front. it was about the size of a washing machine, smaller than any aircraft i have seen. i had time to look away and then look back and reacquire it several times.

i tried mentioning it to a good friend and judged from his reaction that i should just keep it to myself. he is a high-hour commercial pilot and basically said that no good would come to any aviator or engineer that claimed to seen anything unusual.

though i live in some proximity to af plant 42 and regularly see traffic from that facility they are generally on approach heading west into the wind for landing and are much higher. this uh chair was low, close and heading east without a sound.

i'm a pilot & engineer and have 20-10 vision. last flight physical rated my hearing as "acute". 

now a camera and binoculars are kept on a hook near the front door.
content.summary: Flying armchair

content.detailedDescription: Thank  you for this resource.  about 10:20 pm last evening on my to work to do 3rd shift i notcied a redish flashing object to pass above me at some altitude. i could not give exact. on the way to my jeep i typically look up to see what stars are out so im always looking up around that time on my way to work. as i looked up it took me by suprise to see this object as it was very clear and very noticable . i would say the direction was southeast moving slightly to the northeast, i stood in my yard, i live in a residential neighborhood in louisville ky, and just watched ...It moved not in a line as airplanes do but haphazzard like and then at one p0int while flashing it seemed to split in to and synchronisticly flash like one would flash and the other part would flash then they came back together and continued their direction for a short bit then dissapeared. the whole instance was maybe two minutes slightly over two minutes....I assure you what i saw was not normal by avaiation standards and i would not waste your time by typing this .. feel free to contact me about anything further ..I dont wish to give out my last name or exact address at this time ..Take care, tim
content.summary: Flashing object moved slowly and seemed to split into two

content.detailedDescription:
My partner (astoria) and i (dolphyn) were attending the eceti conference at the sattva sanctuary near mt. adams, wa. we were skywatching around 9:30 pm and waiting for the lights to fire up on the mountain. we noticed a large bright, glowing, sphere-shaped object in the western sky and checked it out with our spotting scope.  we saw clearly that this object was undulating, moving like an amoeba or jellyfish.  it contained what appeared to be thousands of teeny brilliant lights inside.  we got out the camcorder and started to tape what we saw, although the camcorder didn't record exactly what we saw in the scope, it was still brilliant in the camera viewfinder.  astoria kept the object in her sight with the scope and i ran the camera as best i could.  once i got the camera settled on the tripod, i did not move the telefoto in and out, but yet the object appeared to move in close and move out without the benefit of the telefoto.  we asked other conference attendees who were camping by us to look at it.  they saw the same thing we saw, a glowing object that was moving in and out, close to us then far away.  it didn't look like a plane, or a star, or a satellite.  there was a square shaped apperature in the middle that moved like an 'eye' up and down and all around. this 'eye' movement was clearly visible when the object moved in close to us.  after about 30 mins, astoria saw lights coming out of the top of it, then the larger object went out of view, appeared to drop out of site.  we also saw a smaller 'ship' that was at 2:00 to the larger object, which when viewed in the spotting scope, appeared to be doing the same undulations and was filled with bright lights, as well, although it looked to be much further away than the larger object.  through the spotting scope the object appeared to divide into large brilliant lights, but in the camera viewfinder it wasn't as apparent, although the lights were still visible.  this occurred between 9:30 p.M and 10:20 pm.

after we lost sight of the object, we began to focus our attention on the lights on the mountain.  while we were viewing the western sky object, other conference attendees were watching mt. adams (which was to our right, or north) and their whoops and hoots could be heard on the tape as lights fired up on the mountain.  we did tape a few of the mountain lights but  they flashed on and off so quickly that it was hard to tape them.

around 11:30 pm, we grew tired and went into the motor home to sleep.  around 2 or 3 am, i was awakened by a bright flash, like someone was outside the motor home and took my picture with a flash camera through the window.  i raised my head up to look outside the window and neither saw nor heard anyone outside.  i looked at the mountain and saw lights going off all over, left and right, above the tree line.  i laid back down and then saw a tiny brilliant light near the ceiling of the motor home.  i watched the light move three times before i called to astoria to wake her up and ask her if she saw it, too. this was not a frightening experience for me.  the light didnot emmanate fear.  if anything, i felt a calming, loving presence, which is why i wanted astoria to see it too. but, when i spoke .. called her, it just disappeared.
content.summary: Brilliant glowing object western sky  - no sound

content.detailedDescription: my parents are divorced and i was spending the summer with my father and his new family.. we were driving home from dinner one evening and i was sitting in the back seat of my fathers car. my brother was very young and looking at distant airplane running lights..He asked me "what is that". i looked in his direction and expected to see an airplane.. instead saw a large, hovering shiny black object that was shaped like two ice cream cones with pointed ends facing up and down with a circular ring around the center and a small ball shaped part on the very top and bottom. i remember that it seemed to be perfectly stationary and maybe a quarter mile from the road and probably nearly 50 feet in height and 20 feet wide at its center.....Because it was almost dark and the time that has passed im only certain of the visual description and not the real size.  we had stopped for a long street light and i was yelling for my father to look at it, but after a few moments we began to drive off and as we did, the object wobbled as if it was a pendulum, that is, the top stayed still while the bottom rocked back and forth and in roughly the same time it shot up and to the left quickly and out of my veiw.    i do recall other people standing nearby... possibly from parked cars that looked to be watching it also. this memory is also not very clear.     my father and i never talked about it again...........In fact, ive told very few people about it. but ive never stopped wanting to tell anyone that might be interested and not think that im nuts or lying. my visual memory is still fresh because ive drawn the object many times since then and tried to understand just what it could have been... it looked absolutely bizare. i recall that i was excited and  pretty scared at seeing this thing..Ive seen things in my life that were odd but this thing frightened me.
content.summary: Was getting dark at night object was hovering and jet black

content.detailedDescription:
Well i was taking the rubbish(garbage) out for my mother at approx midnight, with the dog also! went in to the back garden to get the big green bin, it was a lovely night, warm, clear sky, stars were all out.

i stood there i looked up at the sky, with tilted head back an perfect view of the stars, an first looked at what looks like a frying pan or what people an i describe as the pot, for 2 minutes, 
turned round to the left an looked up with my whole head back, the next part i could'nt believe.

as clear as day i seen two objects that were roundish traveling very fast at the same speed they were illuminated with an reddish orange light going almost around the objects, they traveled at the same speed for about ten seconds then the other object accelerated slightly ahead then back a bit trying to curve around the other one, like the second one was playing with it in some way, at 12:04am

i tell you right now, it wasnot a satalite, or a jetplane no noise, the way they moved especially the second one was smart as f**k,
it was either two ufo's (alien's -ebe's) or some secret craft,

i was stunned, an this is fresh as you can get it at 1:24am in the morning, on my computer, i know what i saw- just like when you see a tree, as simple as that, end
content.summary: Two objects, traversing at same speed for 15 seconds with second one accelerating ahead( playing)

content.detailedDescription:
big lake, oregon sighting

     on august 27th, 1983: 05:30 am, big lake road and five miles south of oregon state highway 22 (santiam hwy.) 70 miles east of salem and 60 miles northwest of bend.  i was getting ready to join four   of my friends shortly (who were still asleep in their tent) for a roped ascent of mt. washington whose summit is at 7,400 feet four miles to the southeast from big lake where we were camped along the road.  i was standing at the left edge of the gravel road gazing at the milky way.  at 4000 feet elevation you can see your hand from the reflection of starlight. polaris was to the north and some 45 deg altitude.  suddenly, i noticed what seemed like the trees were on fire low in the fir trees north along the left side of the road.  there were huge erratic flames lighting up the terrain.  in the next instance i realized there was no fire but a solid rectangular object.  its path being continuous, it appeared to rise, then veer to my right at an altitude of two-thirds the height of polaris to the horizon. the flames ���went out��� from its leading face - the narrowest of its dimensions, but were instantly replaced by two extremely brilliant ���tails��� or sheets of solid yellow- white ablation trailing behind the object that had the appearance of being ���turned on��� as it now streaked easterly some distance below polaris. these thin ���tails���- one for each edge, near and far- were like the lower part of a kite below the horizontal spar. the rectangular solid shape���s height was twice its width and the width was twice that of its thickness. this object was tilted with its top to the right (about 10 degrees) and somewhat away from me so that i could see its bottom. this orientation was maintained throughout. the white hot ablating ���kite- like tails��� lit up the entire area like daylight for a brief moment - about a second.  there was bright blue sky and the surrounding trees, road and campground were just like broad daylight.  the sky returned to dark with the stars in the background being blocked out by this object.  the white hot tail with trailing orange brown smoke ���turned off��� but the object continued on its eastward path its shape being clearly discerned by orange glowing lines at all of its visible edges. the space in between the lines was a dark gray brown. i could clearly see an orange seam across its middle as well.  finally, there were a few orange sparks curving backwards from its leading edges.  then the object disappeared into the night sky with only a wisp of trailing white smoke perhaps catching the first rays of the sun before dawn would bathe the campground sunlight in an hour and a half.  total time of sighting, 4-5 seconds.
     please see the full report filed with ufo evidence in the archived reports for 1983. this object���s length was more than twice that of the diameter of the moon or 7/16th inch. (this my final assessment from using pencils and a template with various circles, sighting the moon, mt. st. helens (elev. 8600 ft.), 35 miles north, to mt. hood, (elev.11,240 ft), 70 miles east and various buildings i can see downtown five miles nw from my house. this object was under the apparent influence of earth���s gravity.  in the first moment low in the trees the object may well have been some 90 miles in altitude which is when the space shuttle begins to turn into a ���fireball���.  if you divide 90 miles(h) (and using a 30 deg angle from my eyes by the cosine of 60 degrees (the angle between the line to the object and down to the surface), you get 156 miles from my eyes to the object when it first encountered heavier air. let���s go back to the last sentence of first paragraph where i said that its tail was a ���wisp of trailing white smoke���. i did a little investigating of noctlucent clouds that have been observed before and after sunrise or sunset.  they are commonly about 50 miles altitude.  assuming the white smoke is similarly receiving the first rays of sunlight, at say 30 degrees altitude and 50 miles in height, so taking 50 and dividing by cos 60 deg, the distance of the object to me is 100 miles when its streaking eastward. then if we project from my eye a ratio of 7/16th   to 24 inches to ���l��� @100 miles, that gives 1.82 miles- the length of the object.    

     my background is that of a land surveyor and associate engineer with my father who���s practice was in eugene for many years. i���m retired now.  my hobbies include mountaineering, backpacking, astronomy, weather, classical music, and ufo���s ���back to 1947.  i���ve obviously had plenty to think about this the past twenty-four years.
content.summary: Wild, fiery, huge rectangular object in near outer space

content.detailedDescription:
I have no idea if what i saw was a craft, but i was startled at the sight of it.  i was in my backyard in new jersey, stargazing as i normally do.  i believe i was looking in the northwesterly direction though i could be wrong.  the evening did have sporadic cloud cover, but my attention was focused on a clear area of the night sky.
i realize that when your eyes are adjusting to changes in light levels or when you are scanning the sky, things tend to look like they are blinking or moving.  this wasn't the case.  i also have 20/20 vision in case my eyesight comes into question.  i am never under the influence of anything other than my lovely wife.
i had been looking at an area of the sky between two dim stars for a few minutes (five perhaps).  there was nothing close to the brightness of venus or the moon where i was looking.
i was startled to see a light appear in the sky between the stars.  as far as i could tell, there was nothing between them previously (not that i could perceive anyway). the brightness grew in intensity quickly, over a few seconds, slightly brighter than venus appears.  
it didn't flash like anything i've ever seen in the sky. it only blinked once and went out, but for some reason it seemed to do so with purpose as if someone were behind it, flicking a light switch on and off.  it went dark quickly and there was nothing in the sky after the light was gone.  no distant star, no plane or helicopter.  just space.  it made my heart race.
i've been trying to find out what it might be in terms of rational science and the closest is venus.  this wasn't anywhere near venus.  or the moon.
this may not classify as something you would note as a significant sighting, but in my 37 years on the planet (earth, by the way) i have never seen anything like it.

thank you,

jon
content.summary: Flash or pulse of distant, bright light

content.detailedDescription: I reported strange lights and behavior in the sky over bakersfield yesterday, but i think i solved the problem. i suspect that someone had been flying a large kite with leds attached to it. i suspect that the string holding the kite broke, and the kite actually flattened out and was carried off by the wind. i also suspect the people that were driving the cars following the object were actually the people that were flying the kite, and they were trying to recover it. i believe their intention was to perpetrate a hoax, and i feel silly for falling for it, but i had never even knew that it was possible to do something like this until i did some further research. sorry for the false report, and thank you for your time.
content.summary: Previous report i made identified

content.detailedDescription: I was a child at the time of the event.  there had been a lot of sightings the summer i saw the ufo so i spent manny evenings in the back yard to see if i would see one. this happened in garland, tx in the summer of either 1992 or 1993. as i remember, the luminous circular object came over the small, single-story house we lived in.  the house initially obstructed it from view but as it slowly moved over the house the object was entirely visible.  it didn't make any sound at all. it moved until it was directly overhead and then instantly was gone as if turning off a light.  i ran into the house to tell my parents and there was a "special report" by one of the local tv stations asking anyone who had witnessed the ufo to call in.  i believe the reporter was bob gooding.  my parents didn't call it in.  i don't have any way to estimate the size but it was a clear night and it had to be reasonably low in altitude since the house obstructed it initially.  i would discount the sighting due to my age at the time but it made a big impression on me and it still seems like it happened yesterday.  also, the "special report" should be easy to verify as far as the date.  i've done internet searches trying to get the date but i've never seen any other accounting of the sighting. i did hear many years later that it was a meteor that crashed, but i can tell you that doesn't fit the object i saw which would have caused substantial damage because it was the size of a 10" saucer at about 8 feet.  so if you extrapolate that it would have to be at least 50 to 100 feet across.  there would have to be many people that saw it.
content.summary: Luminous ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I had just gotten to the motel last night about 9.30.  when i went to the car to unload, i saw some flashes out of the corner of my eye.  when i looked up, i saw a huge rectangular shaped craft.  at first i didn't know what to think.  

it flashed two short flashes and 1 long flash at me, then it was gone.

it reminded me a huge fluorescent light.  it had 3 or 4 rows of blue 'bulbs'.

this was after i saw the 4 lights for 4 or 5 hours, earlier on the drive in the nevada desert.
content.summary: Big blue rectanglular shaped craft

content.detailedDescription: I left my apartment at approximately 9:10pm, drove threw a nearby residental area here in clovis ca look up from my convertable car and noticed a small white ball of light traveling from south to north. the object appeared was traveling about the pace of a jet airplane, but noticed no blinking lights. so, i pulled over next to this house and turned my car off to listen for any sound. i could hear no sound even as i placed my hands by my ears to focus sound better. the object traveled in a relatively stright line but appeared to be shifting side to side very slightly. the oject appeared to be as bright as the planet venus except it appeared to be traveling approximately 1500 feet in the air. the object continued to travel north until it disapeared into the night sky. it just seemed strange that the oject still appeared as a ball of light from its "rear" side as it went past. i read a simular description that appearently took place in reno nv at 10:30pm on the same night with the object heading in the same direction. i wondered if this could be the same oject so i decided to share my experience.
content.summary: Small white sphere traveling from south to north

content.detailedDescription:
Las vegas, nv -- july of 1964 -- 7 months pregnant

i'm in bed but can't get comfortable -- then i remember i've forgotten to take the water pill my doctor just prescribed. my grandmother had given me a lecture on how important it was to take the pills and i pull myself up reluctantly. i get up and go to the kitchen.  i see it's bright outside, through the curtain, and i think there must be a full moon.

i take my pill and just as i put my glass on the counter the room begins to shake.  i've been in after shocks in california and i think it must be a quake.  it lasts for just a short time and i'm excited.  my husband has slept through the quake and i will have something to tell him the next morning.

i start back to bed when i hear the noise.  it's like humming telephone wires but different, more insistent.  i check the oven, the refrigerator, the toaster. i listen to the telephone wires in my backyard, but it's not them. then i realize the noise is coming from outside.

i go to the front door and open it.  my front door faces south onto a large vacant lot with more undeveloped acreage beyond that.  my front door does not face the homes across the street which are east of me. my duplex is on a rise with homes (east) and one home above me on the hill to the west.  it's quiet and a little isolated.

when i open the door all these bright lights are in my face.  i can't see so i keep covering my eyes with my hands and keep trying to peek out.  i imagine there's been a car accident on the hill above me but there are no sounds.  when the lights dim there, in front of me in the vacant lot, sits a flying saucer.

i don't believe in flying saucers.  i think i go into shock because the next thing i remember is standing in my living room with my hands to my sides clenched in fists.  i have no words.  i am fighting to get words. my mind is a blank slate and its been wiped clean. i am fighting so hard i can feel a fine sweat break out on my forehead.

finally i have words.  flying saucer and then flying saucer again.  i have words.  i go to the front door.  it's just sitting there.  red, white and green lights form a halo near the top and they are flashing on and off in rhythm.  it's humming.

i watch it.  i look at my new princess phone -- but don't use it.  i think of waking my husband -- but don't.  all that separates me from the saucer is a tall wooden fence.  i go to the fence and peek over.  i can see the rim around it but i can't see the bottom.

i look at all the houses around me.  no one is out but me.  i am alone, intrigued but afraid.  i go to the end of the fence but become afraid and go back.  i look for windows or doors on the craft but don't see any.  it glows from the inside. the lights keep going on and off and it keeps humming.

i close the door, slap my face and open the door. it's still there and i keep watching.  i find myself leaning relaxed and comfortable against the door frame.  i am alarmed.  something is wrong.  how could i be so relaxed!

then i go to bed.  the next morning i think i tell my husband i saw some funny lights outside.  i avoid walking in the vacant lot which i used to use as a shortcut to a small convenience store.  perhaps i avoid it because i'm so far along in my pregnancy and there's a hill. 

i have a beautiful baby boy in september.  the next month i'm on my way to my surprise baby shower with my husband and another couple.  the woman said she had just read a book about flying saucers.  no sooner does she say the words "flying saucer" then i break out with my story.  they all look at me like i'm nuts.  this is the first time i remember seeing it.

i try to find newspaper stories about the month of my sighting to see if anyone else saw it, but don't find anything.  i am a busy young mother and now i read everything i find about saucers.  seven years later i decide to see a hypnotist.  i tell him i saw a flying saucer and want to remember it.  he tells me he doesn't believe in flying saucers but thinks there might be a problem, something traumatic i don't want to remember.  i say fine, i think i saw a saucer but if you can show me differetly let's do it.

little happens the first two sessions.  i am not a good subject and i get so nervous before the appointments that i'm almost bouncing off the walls.  at the third session i really go under.  he has me imagine i am walking down a corridor of offices.  my name is on one of them and when i get to it i am to open it and see my problem.

i see myself walking and i see my name on the door.  i'm hesitant.  he tells me to open the door. i put my hand out to open it but then a hand, just a hand, comes out from the right and slowly and methodically erases my name from the door in a slow circular motion.  he keeps telling me to open the door and i begin laughing.  i tell him i can't open it because a hand came out and erased my name.  he tells me i have a "mental block" against remembering.

i decide not to go again.  first i'm too nervous.  i become a nervous wreck before each session and i'm wasting money.  those are the reasons i use not to go again.

as the years pass the feelings of nervousness subside, coming about once a year around july, the month of my sighting. i tell my family doctor and he says he knows me to be an honest, normal person and there are some things we may never get the anwer to in our lifetimes.

i do not know about the concept of "missing time" until i read more books on the subject of flying saucers.  i am not a flying saucer nut.  i attend no conventions or tell everyone about it, but i know what i saw.

i am divorced and working for the court system in las vegas.  i run across a web page from someone called bob bigelow who is collecting information and i make contact.  i end up telling my story to one of his people and he asks if i would consider further action like hypnotism.  i say no.

now i'm 63 and watcing the larry king live show and they're talking about flying saucers.  i decide to contact mufon.  i feel time is running out to get this resolved and i've come to believe it's possible that my incident had missing time.  perhaps, on the small chance my incident might reveal more information, i decide to call.

i can't say that i believe i was abducted.  i truly hope i wasn't, yet something is wrong.  why is this still affecting me so strongly and why did i go back to bed?  why was i leaning against the doorframe when i should have been on the alert?

even as i write this i vacillate. part of me wants to find out and the other part is frightened.
content.summary: Saucer landed outside my duplex on a vacant lot.  i was 7 months pregnant at the time and watched it for at least 20-30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i were driving south on the 5 freeway coming home to san diego from l.A. 
when we were inbetween the 2 exits for san clemente park i saw a bright orb hovering above the trees and homes to the right of the freeway. it must have been 90 feet up. it was pulasating bright to dim. there was a truck that was pulled over on the side of the road and a man was looking at this thing. at first it looked like a light but as we passed it we could see it was not attached to a pole or anything, it was floating/hovering. after we passed it i could see it in my review mirror and my girlfriend could see it cause she was not driving...It continued to pulse. i pulled of at the next exit and turned around and could see the orb still pulsating but now it was a lot dimmer. as i drove towards this thing it was getting dimmer and dimmer and then was it gone. we drove around and waited for like 5 minutes and then left.  the neighborhood seemed completly oblivious.  we were near camp pendlton (a marine base) and we talked that it could have been some sort of military thing but we were still pretty far from the base and this was not a flare. this thing was stationary.
content.summary: Orange/red orb that was pulsating
